item.title: Laura Baumeister, Alvaro Brechner, Pablo Stoll to Present Projects at San Sebastián’s Co-Production Forum
item.description: Laura Baumeister’s “What Follows Is My Death,” Alvaro Brechner’s “La piel de león” and Pablo Stoll’s “Dad Is No Punk Rocker” feature among 15 projects set to be unveiled at San Sebastián’s 2025 Europe
